website_summaries.verdict: With a compelling mix of imaging, stability, and safety features, DJI's Mavic Air 2 is the best drone you can buy for under $1,000.
cons: Video profiles limited to standard and flat
Not easy to get Raw images to your tablet or smartphone

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality But Still Disappointing. Software needs to be sorted out. AVOID.
customer_reviews.text: This was my first drone, out of the box and set it all up. Unfortunately I got an error message before it even took flight. Gimbal data error Code 40021. Contacted DJI support but they could not come up with a solution, advised me to send it back to Amazon. Waiting for a refund. The second replacement drone would not stop beeping. Contacted DJI support. They said configure the joysticks, that stopped it beeping until you switched it off and back on again. They could not come up with a solution. I have sent it back to Amazon. So DJI need to get the software sorted. Avoid ..... keep your money in your pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Expensive paperweight
customer_reviews.text: Error code 1112 reported lost or stolen according to dji online support
customer_reviews.author: kevin harvey

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic first drone
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic drone if it’s your first. I upgraded from the mini as it had too many issues with wind. Not with this. Had this flying in 30mph winds no problem at all. 4K 60fps, 12MP Raw and some every clever tracking modes. Would definitely recommend this as your first drone or if you want to upgrade from the mini
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan P.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fly and great image quality.
customer_reviews.text: Got this after all the hype I’d seen on YouTube and the rave reviews it was getting from photographers and film makers. Was not disappointed. Battery life is good, but if you can stretch to it then I’d advocate getting the fly more combo so you don’t have to keep charging one battery. Comes with sore propellers and everything you else you need to get flying right away. Really easy to use and I’m loving flying it. Image quality is spot on!
customer_reviews.author: Kendrick

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: I have been blown away by how good this drone is. Flying is so simple, it has loads of cool features that make filming and photographing really easy. The quality of images is great. Battery life is not good, but with a second back up battery it's acceptable. That's my only criticism. I've been very happy with everything else about it. It's my first drone and I couldn't be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: Heatherjg

customer_reviews.title: Great drone full of tech
customer_reviews.text: Have had drones before but this one is exceptional.Its packed full of features flys well with ease of use and takes 48mp photos 4K video. If flown in a sensible fashion you can get about 30mins of flight pop it on sport mode then you get less. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Clive

customer_reviews.title: Best drone for the value
customer_reviews.text: Footage is great and comes packed with features. Also very stable and is shipped with object detecting sensor which prevents the drone from crashing against unexpected objects. It is very reliable specially if you're not an experienced pilot.
customer_reviews.author: Nuno

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great fun and a learning curve at the same time. It's mine!
customer_reviews.author: Jallydally

customer_reviews.title: Great all rounder.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. The quality of the photography and video is magnificent. Very easy to use. Bought this to survey roof details. Son uses it for sports photography. Very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Froggy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic drone
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic drone great video super stable images easy to fly great features gps return home etc highly recommend this drone .
customer_reviews.author: C B Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Very prompt delivery from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son and he is very pleased with it
customer_reviews.author: Mr T Roberts

customer_reviews.title: The best you can buy for it's price
customer_reviews.text: I honestly couldn't be more pleased with this. I bought it to replace my Holystone HS720 which in reality is a good drone. The thing is, the Mavic Air 2 makes that look like a kiddies toy. Nearly impossible to crash with tones of clever features which make your videos look amazing. I easily get 30+ mins flying time or of the battery and it's so quiet compared to other drones. If this is you reaching reviews looking for a drone, get this or the new DJi mini 2. Both have the same feature set but the mini looks like it may suffer in the wind. This doesn't BTW.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Impressive bit of kit
customer_reviews.text: Still exploring all its feature set. Easy to fly. Excellent picture and 4K video quality. Controller is much improved over Mavic Mini. Flys well with great stability in quite strong winds. Good feature set for photographers.
customer_reviews.author: Kawashe

customer_reviews.title: Love it flies great
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bit expensive but well worth the price so easy to fly great quality live it
customer_reviews.author: I Marriott

customer_reviews.title: I want one
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t got and I don’t think I want to spend this much on a drone which would just be a toy to me. But i watched a tourist today setting up on the beach and I thought he must be new to it because it was soooo windy and I thought there was no way he could fly it. I was gobsmacked when it flew over me to go back to him....as stable as you like and believe me it was very windy .I just thought I would say because I was so impressed.
customer_reviews.author: matroose

customer_reviews.title: Impressive machine
customer_reviews.text: Only had this a month, but what a powerful drone. Solid and will fly long and high and do exactly what you want it to do. A few issues with follow me but all can be overcome. I believe some TV news channels now use the air 2 and that comes as no surprise at all. The power of the camera is simply amazing. Yeah it wont give you the same control a £10,000 drone will give you but it is stunning what it can do! Money well spent. I bought a flymore package ;) Worth every single penny
customer_reviews.author: Ally Strachan

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant.
customer_reviews.text: Love it, had drones for some years now including the Inspire 1 and this for the price is brilliant, bought direct from Dji when first launched so been flying a few months now and I cant fault it, video and photo are top notch. Fly app is a bit basic but hopefully will get better with updates.
customer_reviews.author: M Walker

product_meta.title: DJI Mavic Air 2 - Drone Quadcopter UAV with 48MP Camera 4K Video 1/2 inch CMOS Sensor 3-Axis Gimbal 34min Flight Time ActiveTrack 3.0 - Grey
product_meta.description: Style Name:Mavic Air 2Mavic Air 2 takes power and portability to the next level, offering advanced features in a compact form factor. Intelligent shooting functions and excellent image quality put aerial masterpieces within reach. Safer, smarter flight enables you to up your game while fully enjoying the creative process.
feature_bullets: ULTRA-CLEAR DETAILS: Capture impressive 48MP photos with a 1/2-inch CMOS sensor while the 3-axis gimbal lets you create extra smooth 4K/60fps video
CINEMATIC CAPTURE: Mavic Air 2 supports Hyperlapse in 8K, allowing you to warp time and space for especially stunning footage, you can achieve this shot without complex post-processing
FLY LONGER: The impressive battery life of up to 34-min allows you to pull off epic shots while the obstacle avoidance system uses forward, backward, and downward sensors for improved safety
FLY FARTHER: OcuSync 2.0 has a video transmission distance of up to 6 km and can also deliver 1080p FHD resolution live stream directly from the drone’s camera
FLY SMARTER: Spotlight 2.0 keeps the camera locked on a subject while you fly freely. ActiveTrack 3.0 keeps the subjects in the centre of the frame. Thanks to POI 3.0 the camera can track objects

IN THE BOX: Mavic Air 2 Aircraft, Remote Controller, Intelligent Flight Battery, 3x Low-Noise Propellers (Pair), RC Cables (USB Type-C, Lightning, Standard Micro-USB), Control Stick, Gimbal Protector, Battery Charger, Manuals, AC Power Cable, Type-C Cable
